attributes.action: Stop The advertising of Abortions on TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rules restricting the advertising of condoms on TV could be relaxed under new proposals put forward by the Committee of Advertising Practice (CAP) and the Broadcast Committee on Advertising Practice (BCAP).

Adverts for pregnancy advisory services could be allowed in prime-time evening slots on the major channels and radio following consultation by advertising watchdogs.

Advertisers must stipulate if the service does not refer women directly for abortion under the new proposals.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with the Advertising Standards Authority:

http://www.asa.org.uk/asa/ 

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
